entry.title: WIND WARNING , Comox
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:57 PM PST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 7.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Comox Airport 7:00 PM PST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 7.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 74 %
Dewpoint: 2.6°C
Wind: S 22 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 7.
